channel.title: Alchemy tablet

item.title: Alchemy tablet
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Ok, well, you know how RuneScape has like level-4 enchant tablets, or whatever. Well, I want to make a tablet for people who don’t have the required level to cast high alchemy. Just like a teletab, but instead of teleporting you, It alch’s. Here’s the code I’ve been working on.

case 17010: //Alchemy tab { deleteItem(17010, getItemSlot(17010), 1); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); setAnimation(712); stillgfx(113, absY, absX); resetanim = 12; } break;

I think I need to add something above the

deleteItem(17010, getItemSlot(17010), 1);

But I’m not sure.

Any help/ideas?

Read full topic
